data.comment: The match is underway in Saint Paul.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Minnesota throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 3, Minnesota are pushing forward but Jan Gregus's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Throw-in high up the field for Dallas in Saint Paul.
In the minute 7, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick Minnesota.
Goal! Minnesota have got their heads in front thanks to a Mason Toye strike.
Robin Lod with an assist there.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Dallas in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota's Emanuel Reynoso misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Dallas at Allianz Field.
In the minute 14, Robin Lod of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Dallas.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Throw-in for Dallas at Allianz Field.
In the minute 21, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Minnesota throw-in in Dallas's half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 26, Dallas's Ricardo Pepi breaks free at Allianz Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 28, It's now 2-0 in Saint Paul as Kevin Molino scores for Minnesota.
Romain Metanire instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 30, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Jan Gregus for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Dallas at Allianz Field.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dallas drive upfield and Ricardo Pepi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
In the minute 40, Michael Barrios (Dallas) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Ricardo Pepi pulls one back for Dallas to make it 2-1.
In the minute 42, That's a fine assist from Bryan Reynolds.
Throw-in for Dallas at Allianz Field.
Alex Chilowicz will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Alex Chilowicz blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Saint Paul.
Andres Ricaurte is on a sub for John Nelson for Dallas.
In the minute 47, Chase Gasper (Minnesota) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Kevin Molino of Minnesota smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 53, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Jan Gregus (Minnesota) strikes at Allianz Field but his header is cleared.
Minnesota are coming forward and Emanuel Reynoso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas.
In the minute 56, Michael Boxall is booked for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 61, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Minnesota are coming forward and Jose Aja gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Dallas make their second substitution with Tanner Tessmann replacing Brandon Servania.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 65, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dallas are pushing forward but Michael Barrios's finish is wide of the goal.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Kevin Molino hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Minnesota!
Goal kick for Dallas at Allianz Field.
Alex Chilowicz blows against Minnesota's Mason Toye for offside.
In the minute 68, Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Field with Harold Mosquera replacing Ricardo Pepi.
Minnesota have been given a penalty at Allianz Field...
Kevin Molino gives Minnesota a 3-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 73, Dallas's Andres Ricaurte gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a first substitution, with Jacori Hayes replacing Emanuel Reynoso.
In the minute 74, Alex Chilowicz signals a Minnesota throw-in in Dallas's half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Dallas.
Harold Mosquera strikes to reduce the deficit to 3-2 at Allianz Field.
Great play from Bressan to set up the goal.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Jose Aja (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Minnesota.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 81, Raheem Edwards is replacing Mason Toye for the home team.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 82, Romain Metanire (Minnesota) has been shown a straight red card by referee Alex Chilowicz.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Ryan Hollingshead with Dante Sealy.
Bakaye Dibassy is replacing Kevin Molino for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 89, Dallas to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Throw-in Dallas.
Harold Mosquera for Dallas drives towards goal at Allianz Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Harold Mosquera (Dallas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Dallas, close to Minnesota's area.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Dallas at Allianz Field.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
The match has come to a close in Saint Paul. The final score is 3-2.
